entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unactionable Trim warnings when referencing both Npgsql and Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Resilience #97057
  • tcp-throughput regression (localhost) with NetworkStream.ReadAsync()/WriteAsync() from .net 6.0.26 to .net 8.0.1 #97056
  • [wasm] WBT tests using `BrowserRunner` seem to hang on a subsequent `dotnet new` #97054
  • Tests crashing in CI with no dump: exit code 137 means SIGKILL Killed eg by kill #97049
  • (Performance) Simd vector loaded from memory instead of register multiple times #97046
  • [wasm] AOT tests *build* timing out on Linux #97044
  • Assertion failed 'loop->EntryEdge(0)->getSourceBlock()->KindIs(BBJ_ALWAYS)' #97040
    9.0.0
  • error C3611: 'System::Numerics::INumberBase::System::IUtf8SpanFormattable.Try Format': a sealed function cannot have a pure-specifier #97036
  • Intermittent crash in ObjectNative::PulseAll #97034
  • Can't build with libs.src+libs.ref on Windows #97029
  • RSACng Decryption throwing Internal Error Occurred exception #97027
  • iOS Connecting with Server with TLS 1.3 Only fails #97025
  • Improve error reporting for dynamic method invokation via reflection #97022
  • System.IO.Tests.File_GetSetTimes_SafeFileHandle.WritingShouldUpdateWriteTime_After_SetLastAccessTime failing #97020
  • ValidationCotnext doesn't support GetKeyedService() method. #97019
  • Too large individual GC pause (~ 4 minutes) while total memory isn't large #97018
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 5 Regressions on 1/11/2024 10:37:40 PM #97042
  • [API Proposal]: Add AssemblyBuilder.SetEntryPoint(MethodInfo) method #97015
    9.0.0

Closed

  • `HandleRefTest.Validate_NoGC()` disabled for GCStress #96364
  • TcpClient.Client nullability declaration and actual behavior mismatch #97050
  • Improvements for Delegate.GetHashCode() for CsWinRT (and NativeAOT) #96947
  • Dont know how to install .NET on raspberry pi #94141
  • UInt64.CreateSaturating<Int128> truncates instead of saturates #94523
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'tmpGetCount == 0' #96599
    9.0.0
  • Will there be GetEnumerator() for MemoryCache ? #36554
    9.0.0
  • Fast path Json Serialization sometimes not enabled #97030
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.MetricsTests.TestMeterCreationWithOptions #96966
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690.cmd #96967
  • HttpClient Support Data URLs (scheme data:) #95838
  • Why do HttpHeaders.GetValues() throw when header does not exist? #96176
  • HttpClient.DefaultProxy should respect IE proxy changes #46910
    Future
  • SslStream should do a better job of allocating buffer for encryption #51478
    9.0.0
  • Native memory leak on TLS client reading OCSP staple. #96616
    7.0.x
  • System.Numerics.Tensors xml documentation doesn't appear in Visual Studio #27994
    Future
  • docker: Error response from daemon: failed to create endpoint affectionate_thompson on network nat: Windows does not support host IP addresses in NAT settings. #96954
  • BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGeneration intermittent test failures #96904
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] `System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.CloseTest.CloseOutputAsync_ClientInitiated_CanReceive_CanClose` failing on browser #65796
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deadlock in BrowserWebSocket when used from multiple threads #96173
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT doesn't produce a warning if `StartupHookSupport` is enabled #96052
  • Dotent 8 can't pass while I added static library in dotnet project #97016
  • The DiagnosticsHelper.CompareTags method assumes that the list for the default meter factory create method is sorted, but the list is not sorted.” #96979
    Future
  • Build time regression on Linux #96884
    9.0.0
  • Trying to verify continuation task web response result #81708
    Future
  • System.Numeric.Tensors should be moved to runtimelab #42031
    Future
  • [arm32/Linux] System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests failures on arm32 linux #28092
    Future
  • Consider weakly caching large arrays in the ArrayPool #13344
    Future
  • Try to reduce overhead of abstraction in Utf-8 integer formatter APIs #24211
    Future
  • "Unknown switch" when trying to compile NativeAOT. #97006
  • [API Proposal]: System.ClientModel #94126
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Threading.Channels.Tests.SyncMultiReaderUnboundedChannelTests.ManyProducerConsumer_ConcurrentReadWrite_Success(numReaders: 10, numWriters: 1) #70061
    Future
  • Kerberos ticket is not fetched when target is a user #16576
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce code size impact of `ArrayPool<T>` #97058
    area-System.Buffers
  • Forward minipal_get_length_utf16_to_utf8 and minipal_convert_utf16_to_utf8 from DAC #97055
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable CMake Flag `-W3` as New CMP0092 no Longer Does it Implicitly #97053
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][mt] throw from blocking wait on JS interop threads #97052
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/8.0-staging] UInt64.CreateSaturating<Int128> truncates instead of saturates #97047
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • Fix Options Source Gen RangeAttribute Thread Safety #97045
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [PERF] Remove HybridGlobalization test name extension from iOS tests #97043
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Un-revert ratelimiting change #97041
    area-System.Threading
  • Revert "[browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode" #97035
    area-Build-mono
  • [wip][browser] Refactor AssertFilesOnDisk function to check subset of files #97031
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono] Add amd64 intrinsics for Vector128 Abs #97024
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [RISC-V] Update TODOs for RiscV64 Machine and Architecture in Crossgen2 #97021
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Fix server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #96808
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #96838
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.x
  • Move FreeBSD CI leg to CBL-Mariner and v13 #97038
    os-freebsd, area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Don't shorten OCSP expriation on failed server OCSP fetch #96972
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Make startup hooks kind of work with native AOT #96894
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • UInt64.CreateSaturating<Int128> truncates instead of saturates #96369
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove some early fgReorderBlocks calls #97012
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix assertion at BigInteger.TryParse(null, out _) #96930
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Consume regs for BlkOpKindLoop #97014
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • extend MemoryCache with `ICollection<object> Keys` property #94992
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Gen0 segment should always be reported as Gen0 for DacHeapWalker #96861
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Crossgen2 PDB generation (again) #96566
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95218
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.27
  • [release/7.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95217
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 7.0.16
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95216
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.2
  • Disable load/store vector APIs until Mono adds support for it #96944
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add DOTNET_JitDisasmOnlyOptimized knob #96960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce process count for ETW manifest test #96950
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • Remove more helper frames by converting methods to QCalls #96926
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] WebSocket thread affinity & server initiated close #96618
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use collection expressions for UnmanagedCallConv.CallConvs #97017
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Produce Native AOT runtime packs on Windows #97023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [release/8.0] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96577
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96578
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 7.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Remove obsolete C++ name mangling #96983
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix native AOT outerloop #97008
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64: Add IF_SVE_DT_3A, IF_SVE_DU_3A, IF_SVE_DX_3A, IF_SVE_DY_3A #96201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve

Updated

  • Make multiple calls to FinalRelease safe #97059
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Remove Explicit Deletion of CMake `/GR` Flag as 3.20's *CMP0117* by Default Doesn't Add It #96814
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    blocking-release, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging tests #96883
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Ensure that the Create(Dot(...)) optimization doesn't kick in for Vector2 pre SSE4.1 #96951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Log to Vector64/128/256/512 #96913
    area-System.Numerics
  • [RISC-V] Enable On Stack Replacement #96558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT] 32-bit platform ObjWriter and bit rot fixes #96890
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Allow jump-to-next-block removal for blocks with alignment #97011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Hardware accelerated implementation of Quaternion multiply #96624
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #95859
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Experiment: Minopts lsra #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] macOS: Set certificate as a dependency of private key handles #96993
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • Type test `List<T>` in Enumerable.SequenceEquals and forward to `MemoryExtensions.SequenceEqual(span...)` #97004
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • chore(ilc/mach-o): add workaround or fix for problem with dead_strip #96743
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove the concept of packable fields from EEClass #96699
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-author-action
  • [release/8.0][browser] BrowserWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #97002
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Lock's usage of NativeRuntimeEventSource.Log to account for recursive accesses during its own class construction #94873
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add note about docker in the testing doc (fix #95436) #95557
    documentation, area-Meta, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix ReadOnlyDictionary and improve DebuggerAttributes #94581
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Limit `PNSE` by using Invariant `SortKey` in `HybridGlobalization` #96354
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Change allocation of `MethodData` structures to do less unnecessary work #96857
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip after AOT compilation for library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Test HalfTest: fixed payload preservation testcase for RISC-V #96888
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser] remove legacy js interop #96841
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement getStaticFieldCurrentClass for NAOT #96982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #93456
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization clean up the code #96974
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • NativeAOT implement warning as errors as a compiler feature #96567
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CY_3A and IF_SVE_CY_3B group #96992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Port loop compaction to new loop representation #96995
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Use whole assembly name when looking for already loaded assemblies #96018
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement remaining unimplemented APIs for Builder types #96805
    area-System.Reflection.Emit

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement alternative for reachable block detection #2478

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement lazy PI #2489
  • Writeup on C# Language changes in async2 experiment. #2488

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error when working directory is drive root #38050
  • 'dotnet workload list' CLI command should not download and install workloads without a user permission #38026

Closed

  • Rollback file based workload update fails to upgrade from 8.0.100 to 8.0.101 #37958
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet templating: Condition on csproj ItemGroup item removes entire line from output #35312
    Discussion
  • dotnet.exe steals -d option from dotnet-* tools starting in .NET 6 #29839
    8.0.2xx
  • EF migration generation on publish fails with artifacts output layout (.net 8) #37422
  • [NETSDKE2E]The directory "C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk-manifests" could not be deleted after uninstalling 6.0.312 SDK. #37374
  • dotnet watch run --no-hot-reload stops watching for file changes #30140

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #38057
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #38056
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38055
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #38051
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them #38048
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Manual backport of #37832 servicing fix #38047
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38046
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them. #38045
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.2

Merged

  • Update manifests when rolling back for install after updating from rollback file #37966
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, 8.0.2xx
  • Install manifests for rollback after update --from-rollback-file #37965
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, 8.0.1xx
  • Ensure dotnet/aspnet base image can be inferred for ASP.Net applications #37996
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 8.0.2xx
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2354609 #37964
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #37999
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #37954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the workload feature band #37974
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them. #37832
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 8.0.2xx

Updated

  • [WIP] Check PublishSelfContained #37693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Compute SdkAnalysisLevel Property at the beginning of the SDK Targets #37778
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Remove unneeded strings from an error message #37973
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Add dotnet package search #37916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Identify riscv64 as valid arch #37994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add filtering to SdkSupportedTargetPlatformVersion validation. Fixes #38016. #38017
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use runtime packs for NativeAOT on .NET 9.0 or higher #37872
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

Issues

Updated

    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CS8073 | Analyzer says the expression is always false, but I say otherwise #71661
  • Switch expression with mixed type and property patterns results with MSB6006 "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 #71660
  • EditorConfig designer adds end_of_line setting to generated .editorconfig file #71659
  • Intercepting a struct rvalue instance method call with an extension method trips a debug assertion in the compiler #71657
  • Expander button in Rename adornment is not visible in Dark theme #71651

Closed

  • IDE0305 produces invalid code for Add/AddRange #71607
  • CSC : error CS8103: Combined length of user strings used by the program exceeds allowed limit. in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Emit.UnitTests.csproj #71645
  • Delegate creation can result in a delegate violating semantics of an `in` parameter. #71383
    17.10
  • IDE0051 false-positive for private copy constructor in records #67910
    17.10
  • Is this a bug that lambda discards aren't highlighted as keyword? #51553
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • DRAFT: Switch CpsDiagnosticItemSourceProvider to use IProjectTree/ProjectTreeFlags #71664
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix intercepting an instance method with a generic extension method #71658
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Skip the broken tests caused by editor #71656
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix intercepting a struct or enum base method #71655
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Propagate unreachability to local function body state #71654
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Normalize reachable bottom state to not nulls #71653
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix CompilerDeveloperSdk EA Layer #71663
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Support producing a collection expression constructed from other spreaded collection expressions #71611
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Remove properties from DocumentSpan" #71662
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • [cherry-pick] Fix build definition #71621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include buildhost deps.json #71597
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Verify SyntaxList length in SyntaxNodeCache.TryGetNode() #71642
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Unify how we pass and choose pools #71584
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Handle the 'WSL is not installed' error #71614
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move EditAndContinue and PDB tests to Emit2 #71652
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Only use ReadyToRun on Release builds #71622
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • IDE0051: Consider a record's private constructor as used #71650
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Disallow `ref` to `in`/`ref readonly` method parameter conversion #71531
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, Next

Updated

  • Upstream changes from Vertical Build PoC #71666
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.6 #71665
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update other BCL to 8.0.0 #71516
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure thread-safety in aggregated telemetry #71606
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't create the InheritanceMarginTagger for preview views. #71618
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fixes nested code actions in LSP bug #71456
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove GitHub automation requiring reviews when the SDK version changes #71276
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement extension indexer access #69122
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: update conversion tests for overload resolution failure #71452
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged
  • Invoke code mapper via reflection #70667
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Preserve the whitespaces when rewriting an inheritdoc #71589
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Target Workspace and Features layer tests to .NET #71590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Start local function analysis in unreachable state #71506
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations when creating CompositeText instances. #71493
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add severity filter to Fix All operations #71486
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Make list a collection builder type #71646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose programmatic suppressions from SuppressionInfo #71207
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Simplify the work with generated BoundNodes and emit the xml comments as doc comment in the generated code file #71601
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Epic: Rate Limiting in .NET 9 #53426
  • When using UseStaticFiles, AspNetCore does not call CreateReadStream to get a stream to return via http but rather uses the PhysicalPath to create it's own stream. #53425
  • Configuring Jwt Bearer Authority with simplified authentication configuration leads to degraded security #53423
  • `UseDirectoryBrowser` option for JSON responses #53421
  • Add Or Change Identity Claims In .Net 8 Blazor Web App #53420
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot #53419
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #53418
  • When Serialize using source generation the JsonOptions of the Source generator are ignored #53417
  • Using InputRadioGroup in a component does not generate a unique name #53413
  • ExtraQueryParams not sent when published #53409
  • Proposal for Bi-annual .NET releases (6-month cycle) #53407
  • To Be There More Easily Inject Why There Not #53403
  • Can we have a feature for deleting user claims when we delete users using the default identity in blazor .net 8? #53400

Closed

  • F5 doesn't compile child Razor Component Projects #53334
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #53280
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #53281

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom Fonts Don't Show On A Real Device #19935

    .NET 9 Planning
  • Issue with Clipping in CustomControl within SwipeView RightItems in CollectionView on Android #19920
  • App requesting NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription #19918

Closed

  • Shell.Current.FlyoutIsPresented = true does not toggle the first time on Android #8226
    .NET 8 SR2
  • PanUpdatedEventArgs should provide you with some way of get the current window-relative position of the pan gesture #19914
  • Add IsVisible Property to ToolbarItem #3701
    Backlog
  • Network connection gets terminated on iOS when the app goes background #19913
  • [iOS] Images from paths refuse to load in UI #19833
  • [iOS] Cannot create archive since it fails to unzip because it includes the link to local drive for some reason #19916
  • MAUI iOS - None of the input catalogs contained a matching stickers icon set or app icon set named "appicon" #14721
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

Merged

    area/publishing 🏁, stale
  • Avoid zero-length array allocations #19300
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale

Updated

  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix modal page push in immersive mode #19903
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, stale, area/gestures
  • Remove calls to scoped services on root provider #19593
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Fix Developer Tools option setting for Blazor Hybrid Mac Catalyst view. #19909

  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, stale

    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, Under Consideration

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #19907
